string-array.name: enc_mess
string-array.item: Action is the foundational key to all success.
Don\'t regret the past, learn from it
Believe you can and you're already there.
Live everyday fully!
To be the best, you have to overcome the worst.
The best way out is always through.
All you need is love. We love you!
It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you don't stop!
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
You were born to succeed!
Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
Concentrate on the beauty of the present moment.
We love you and we believe in you!
Stay strong against temptation. You are above it all.
People and things come and go, but we will always be here for you!
Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don't be sorry.
You\'ve got this!
Don\'t give up!
You\'re stronger than
Keep working hard.
Your family loves you.
You are not alone!
Every moment is a fresh beginning
You have overcome, therefore you have become.
Take life one day at a time.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
No one can make you do anything. You are invincible!
Do what you can, with what you've got, wherever you are.
